twoSetSkill.name: Destruction Doll 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: After casting Ultimates 2 times, generate a Doll Aura with a 5-meter radius. Enemies in the AOE are immobilized and take 20% more Physical DMG. The Aura lasts 6. CD: 18s. This effect cannot stack.

threeSetSkill.name: Doll Control 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Shortens duration of debuffs on the host by 30%. Attacks against debuffed enemies also gain 30% Total DMG Multiplier.
